main event: A UFO sighting in Daventry, England, on 28 August 1954 involving an observation of light trails and streamers.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for 3 seconds,It was reported by military personnel,Two smaller streamers were noted along with a larger middle streamer,The object was described as having a slight descent before disappearing gradually,The sighting occurred in a clear sky with good visibility.
sighted object: UFO with white and red trails and streamers
witness description: Military personnel on a C-47 aircraft
